title: Cutting Edge
alt: I remember trying to log in to the original Command and Conquer servers a year or two back and feeling like I was knocking on the boarded-up gates of a ghost town.
transcript:
[Megan is standing. Cueball sits at a computer.]
Megan: Where've you been all week?
Cueball: Playing Half-Life 2!
Megan: ...that came out in 2004.Cueball: I get games on a five-year lag. That way, I never have to buy a high-end system, but get the same steadily-advancing gaming experience as people who do - and at a fraction of the price.Cueball: There are no downsides!
Megan: I can think of one...[Early 2013.]
Cueball: Guys!
Cueball: The cake is a lie!
[Musical notes surround an italic line, suggesting Cueball is singing.]
Cueball: This was a triumph.
Cueball: The cake is a lie!
Megan and a Friend: Sigh
